title: Sergio de las Heras
text: Welcome to my site! I am Sergio de las Heras, MSc in Electrical Engineering, Information Technology and Computer Engineering by RWTH Achen University. In the last few years, I have been mostly focusing in acoustics and pyschoacoustics, working as as student assistant at IHTA and developing my master thesis in Aalto Acoustics Lab in Helsinki. I am currently based in Copenhagen, working as a research intern at Bang&Olufsen.

title: Sergio de las Heras
text:
About Me
I studied my bachelors in Telecommunication Technologies Engineering at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid, before moving to Germany to pursue my masters degree. While in Madrid, I also studied clarinet, and became involved in universityâ€™s photography society where I discovered my passion for analog photography.
